lessons.japanese: 急いでやってミスするよりは、じっくり時間かけた方がいいよ。
lessons.english: It is better to take your time than to hurry and make mistakes.

lessons.japanese: 医師は難しい手術についてじっくり考えた。
lessons.english: The doctor contemplated the difficult operation.

lessons.japanese: その問題について手を打つ前に彼は３日間じっくり考えた。
lessons.english: He turned the problem over in his mind for three days before he did anything about it.

lessons.japanese: じっくり彼に耳を貸す者はいない。
lessons.english: No one stops to listen to him.

lessons.japanese: じっくりあせらずに治すことが大切です。
lessons.english: You have to be patient about your recovery.

lessons.japanese: あなたとじかに会ってじっくり話したいことがあるのです。
lessons.english: I have something to talk over with you, face to face.

lessons.japanese: 物事をじっくり考える慎重派です。
lessons.english: I'm the type who likes to think things over very carefully.

lessons.japanese: 彼は自分の不運についてじっくり考えた。
先週あなたが言った事を私はじっくりと考えていました。
lessons.english: I've been meditating on what you said last week.

lessons.japanese: 自分の過去をじっくり振り返ってみてもよいころだ。
lessons.english: It's time to reflect on your past.

lessons.japanese: 自分の過去をじっくり振り返ってみてもよいころだ。
lessons.english: It is time to reflect on your past.

lessons.japanese: 自分の過去をじっくりと振り返っても良い頃だ。
lessons.english: It's time to reflect on your past.

lessons.japanese: 自分の過去をじっくりと振り返ってみてもよいところだ。
lessons.english: It is time to reflect on your past.
